ComicInfo.Series: The Very Best of Dennis the Menace
ComicInfo.Title: Hairy Tale; Dennis on the War Path; The Wet Pet; The Pet Patrol; The Hero; Shower Power; Meanwhile.... Back at the Ranch...; Nobody's Tool; Just Poolin'; Mov(ie)ing Along; Flea for Your Life!; The Big Question; It's Spring! It's Spring! The Bird is on the wing! My Word! Absurd! The Wing is on the Bird!; Putting on the Dog; RUFFing It
ComicInfo.Summary:
Henry brings a co-worker home for supper and Dennis, dressed as an Indian, tries to "scalp" him.
When Ruff goes missing, the Mitchells call the Pet Patrol radio show.
Dennis wants to take a shower instead of a bath.
Henry tries to teach Dennis and Tommy about real cowboys.
Mr. Mitchell tries to build a lily pond.
Dennis wakes up Henry in the middle of the night to ask him a question.
Mr. Wilson teaches Dennis about pigeon racing.
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Penciller: Owen Fitzgerald,Al Wiseman,Frank Hill,Bill Williams,Owen Fitzgerald,Al Wiseman,Frank Hill,Bill Williams
ComicInfo.Inker: Owen Fitzgerald,Al Wiseman,Frank Hill,Owen Fitzgerald,Al Wiseman,Frank Hill
